item.title: GhGDSL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_74480 Gene Symbol: GhGDSL Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum genome (AD) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYB1 regulates SCW stage-specific expression of the GhGDSL promoter in the fibres of Gossypium hirsutum L.
